articles.title: NASA to launch Webb Space Telescope next Friday - CGTN
articles.description: NASA Administrator Bill Nelson confirmed Friday to launch the James Webb Space Telescope on December 24 by a European Ariane rocket from South America's French Guiana.
articles.content:
NASA is shooting for next Friday Christmas Eve to launch its newest space telescope.

articles.title: Russia demands NATO leave eastern Europe and stay out of Ukraine - SBS News
articles.description: Russia says it wants a legally binding guarantee that NATO would give up any military activity in Eastern Europe and Ukraine, part of a wish list of security guarantees it wants to negotiate with the West.
articles.content:
